verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Al-tashheth. A Psalm of David. Michtam. Do ye indeed <S%H552><s%> in silence <S%H482><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%>? Do ye judge <S%H8199><s%> uprightly <S%H4339><s%>, O ye sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>?
Nay <S%H3820><s%>, in heart ye work <S%H6466><s%> wickedness <S%H5766><s%>; Ye weigh <S%H6424><s%> out the violence <S%H2555><s%> of your hands <S%H3027><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>.
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> are estranged <S%H2114><s%> from the womb <S%H7358><s%>: They go astray <S%H8582><s%> as soon as they are born <S%H990><s%>, speaking <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%>.

Their poison <S%H2534><s%> is like <S%H1823><s%> the poison <S%H2534><s%> of a serpent <S%H5175><s%>: They are like the deaf <S%H2795><s%> adder <S%H6620><s%> that stoppeth <S%H331><s%> her ear <S%H241><s%>,
Which hearkeneth <S%H8085><s%> not to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of charmers <S%H3907><s%>, Charming <S%H2266><s%> never so wisely <S%H2449><s%>.

Break <S%H2040><s%> their teeth <S%H8127><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, in their mouth <S%H6310><s%>: Break out <S%H5422><s%> the great teeth <S%H4459><s%> of the young lions <S%H3715><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Let them melt away <S%H3988><s%> as water <S%H4325><s%> that runneth apace <S%H1980><s%>: When he aimeth <S%H1869><s%> his arrows <S%H2671><s%>, let them be as though they were cut off <S%H4135><s%>.

Let them be as a snail <S%H7642><s%> which melteth <S%H8557><s%> and passeth away <S%H1980><s%>, Like the untimely birth <S%H5309><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%>, that hath not seen <S%H2372><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%>.
Before your pots <S%H5518><s%> can feel <S%H995><s%> the thorns <S%H329><s%>, He will take them away with a whirlwind <S%H8175><s%>, the green <S%H2416><s%> and the burning alike <S%H2740><s%>.

The righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> when he seeth <S%H2372><s%> the vengeance <S%H5359><s%>: He shall wash <S%H7364><s%> his feet <S%H6471><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>;

So that men <S%H120><s%> shall say <S%H559><s%>, Verily there is a reward <S%H6529><s%> for the righteous <S%H6662><s%>: Verily there is <S%H3426><s%> a God <S%H430><s%> that judgeth <S%H8199><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>.
